title: Tree Node Stones - Make Adjacent Difference Exactly 1
problem_statement:
Tree Node Stones - Make Adjacent Difference Exactly 1

Problem Description

You're given a tree with n nodes.

Each node already has a number of stones assigned (some may be zero).

You can only add stones (not remove).

Goal: Add the minimum total number of extra stones so that for every edge (u, v):

|stones[u] - stones[v]| == 1
